hanzi-su-wiki:
肖

Значения

Быть похожим

Мнемоника

Мелко 小 нарезанные куски мяса 月, мало, чем отличающиеся друг от друга. В расширенном понимании — комочек мяса, младенец. Быть подобным отцу, не вырождаться.

similar; resembling; to resemble; to be like
похожий; напоминающий; походить; быть как

фамилия Сяо; Тайвань пр. [Xiao4]
rtega_mnemonic:
肖肖RSlook like, resemble, be like
  • a small part ⺌ of a body ⺼ resembles the whole
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: ⺌ indicates the sound; ⺼ (flesh - "in the flesh") conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
肖像 [ xiào xiàng ]: portrait (painting, photo etc); (in a general sense) representation of a person; likeness
生肖 [ shēng xiào ]: one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支 ; animal from the Chinese zodiac
惟妙惟肖 [ wéi miào wéi xiào ]: to imitate to perfection; to be remarkably true to life
不肖 [ bù xiào ]: (literary) unlike one's parents; degenerate; unworthy
酷肖 [ kù xiào ]: to strikingly resemble
努瓦克肖特 [ nǔ wǎ kè xiāo tè ]: Nouakchott, capital of Mauritania
肖伯纳 [ xiāo bó nà ]: Bernard Shaw (1856-1950), Irish-born British playwright
肖恩 [ xiāo ēn ]: Sean, Shaun or Shawn (name)
肖扬 [ xiāo yáng ]: Xiao Yang (1938-), president of the PRC Supreme Court 1998-2008
肖邦 [ xiāo bāng ]: Frédéric Chopin (1810-1849), Polish pianist and composer

• ⿱ Above to below

heisig_chinese_memo: With DNA matching even a small bit of flesh can be used to make someone resemble someone else.
heisig_constituent: resemblance, spark, candle, small, little, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: The word resemblance should suggest, among other things, a son's resemblance to his father. A "chip off the old block" is the way we often put it, but the character is more simple. It speaks of a little bit of flesh.
koohiiStory1: Using DNA matching, a very little bit of flesh can be used to show the resemblence between family members.
koohiiStory2: Hey baby, it might be a little bit of flesh now, but in a moment it´ll bear a strong resemblance to a candlestick.(nudge nudge, wink wink).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see a triceratops standing in front of a full moon and you can't help but see a really strong resemblance. The triceratops has that round frill thing behind its horns and it looks just like the round full moon. Who knew that a triceratops would resemble the moon!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at the triceratops. Now look at the moon. See the resemblance? Uncanny, don't you think?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The first person to see this resemblance was the Shougun (しょう). That's why he decided to put a triceratops head with the moon behind it on his mon (family crest). Now he's known as the full moon dinosaur shogun, and he's very famous.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine being the Shougun and seeing the resemblance between a triceratops and the moon for the first time. You'd put that on all your stuff too, if you were him.

xiāo: (сущ) Сяо (фамилия)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a small (⺌) moon (⺝) resembles (lots of things)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: With DNA matching even a small bit of flesh can be used to make someone resemble someone else.
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from " moon " to " small ", " small " is also a sound symbol, meaning that the moonlight will gradually disappear, the original meaning is that the moonlight weakens.

He Linyi thought it was the first article of " Xiao ". "Shuowen" mistakenly thought it was from the flesh, which is not true. From " Shaw " word more have gotten smaller, the elimination of meaning, such as " consumer " typeface disappeared, abatement, " cut " means engraved cut, cut, " Qiao ", " steep " means steep, the higher the mountain, the mountain the more Jianqiao sharp small, " shoot " shoot trees, the sense of the end, " a little " in the original meaning of the end of bluegrass, " Shao " the original meaning of the tail, the hair endings, " sales ", " Xiao " have melting , The meaning of destruction (see Jin Guotai).

Bronze inscription is used as a surname, namely " Zhao ". In 29 years, Xiang Bang Zhao Ge: "29 years, Xiang Bang Xiao (Zhao) Leopard", 27 years Liang Si Kou Ding: "Liang twenty and seven years, Da Liang Si Kouxiao (Zhao) is casting his dead wisdom.

"Shuowen": "At night, the flesh and blood are similar. From the meat in a low voice. It is not like the first, so it is called "not shame"."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " moon " to " small ", " small " is also a sound sign, meaning that the moonlight will gradually disappear. The original meaning is that the moonlight is weakened.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「月」從「小」，「小」亦是聲符，會月光漸漸消滅之意，本義是月光減弱。

　　何琳儀認為是「宵」的初文，可備一說。《說文》誤以為從肉，不確。從「肖」的字多有漸小、消減之義，如「消」字表示消失、消減，「削」表示刻削、削減，「陗」、「峭」表示陡峭，山勢越高，山便越尖峭銳小，「梢」是樹木枝梢，有末尾之義，「稍」的本義是禾末，「髾」的本義是髮尾、頭髮末梢，「銷」、「焇」有熔化、銷毀之義(參金國泰)。

　　金文用作姓氏，即「趙」氏，二十九年相邦趙戈：「廿九年，相邦肖(趙)豹」，廿七年大梁司寇鼎：「梁廿又七年，大梁司寇肖(趙)亡智鑄」。

　　《說文》：「宵，骨肉相似也。从肉小聲。不似其先，故曰『不肖』也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「月」從「小」，「小」亦是聲符，會月光漸漸消滅之意，本義是月光減弱。

①用本义。(侧重于本质特点上的相像)。
②用本义。［合］肖子(在志趣等方面与其父一致的儿子)；肖题(切题)；肖似(肖貌，肖神。相似，神似)；肖形(仿形)。
③刻画，谓图画或雕塑人像。［合］肖物(刻画事物)。
④仿效。［合］肖形(仿形。亦泛指形状)。

肖字的基本解释

肖
xiāo
衰微。
姓（“萧”俗作“肖”）。

肖
xiào
相似，像：肖像。不肖。惟妙惟肖。神情酷肖。

肖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiào］
［《廣韻》私妙切，去笑，心。］
“俏2”的被通假字。“宵2”的被通假字。
(1)相似；类似。
(2)犹仿效。谓图画或雕塑人像。
[②]［xiāo］
［《集韻》思邀切，平宵，心。］
(1)细微。
(2)衰微。《史记·太史公自序》：“申吕肖矣，尚父側微。”裴駰集解引徐广曰：“肖音痟。痟猶衰微。”一说，削弱。
(3)姓。

肖字的英文翻译

◎ 肖
be like, resemble

肖字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　肖； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页973第25
【唐韻】私妙切【集韻】仙妙切，?音笑。【說文】骨肉相似也。从肉，小，意兼聲。【玉篇】似也。【書·說命】說築傅巖之野，惟肖。【傳】肖，似也。又【禮·中庸】夫婦之不肖。【揚子·方言】肖，法也。西楚梁益之閒曰肖。【註】肖者，似也。【博雅】肖，類也。　又小也。【揚子·方言】趙肖，小也。　又【韻會】思邀切【正韻】先彫切，?音宵。衰微也。【史記·太史公自序】申呂肖矣。【註】徐廣曰：肖，音痟。痟猶衰微。　又失散也。【莊子·列禦寇】達於知者肖。【註】肖，失散也。　又人名。周肖，魏臣。見【戰國策】。　【集韻】或作俏。亦作霄。

肖字的源字形

肖字的起名意思

：姓；“萧”字的俗写；相似，类似。

Name meaning
: Last name; the customary writing of the word "Xiao"; similar, similar.
肖
形声字。肉(月)表意,表示人的肉体或相貌相似;小( xido )表声,小有细微义,表示只有细微的差别。本义为相貌
相似。引申为相像。
Oxiao 相似;像:不~「神情毕~。Oxiao 姓。
O~像 ~像画 逼~ 毕~ 酷~ 生~ 不~子孙
惟妙惟~
xiào / xião
少||肖
,琴
Шоу
Пиктофонетические символы.
Мясо (месяц) означает, что тело или внешний вид людей похожи; маленький (xido) означает звук, а маленький имеет тонкое значение, что означает, что есть только тонкие различия.
Первоначальный смысл похож по внешнему виду.
Расширенный, чтобы походить.
Оксиао похож: вроде: нет ~ "выглядит полным ~. Фамилия Оксиао.
О ~ как ~ как сила живописи ~ би ~ круто ~ шэн ~ нет ~ детей
Вэйвэйвэй ~
xiào / xião
Меньше || шоу
, Цинь
xiào, xiāo
1) xiào напоминать; походить, быть похожим на, иметь сходство с...
语声颇肖其兄 речью очень походил на своего брата
2) xiāo Сяо (фамилия)
3) xiāo устар. вм. 消 (сходить на нет; приходить к концу, исчезать)
4) xiāo устар. вм. 小 (маленький)
Radicals: 月  (moon, triceratops)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see a triceratops standing in front of a full moon and you can't help but see a really strong resemblance. The triceratops has that round frill thing behind its horns and it looks just like the round full moon. Who knew that a triceratops would resemble the moon!
Look at the triceratops. Now look at the moon. See the resemblance? Uncanny, don't you think?
Reading Mnemonic
The first person to see this resemblance was the Shougun (しょう). That's why he decided to put a triceratops head with the moon behind it on his mon (family crest). Now he's known as the full moon dinosaur shogun, and he's very famous.
Imagine being the Shougun and seeing the resemblance between a triceratops and the moon for the first time. You'd put that on all your stuff too, if you were him.

尚 (ещё), 月 (месяц)
